local-cache-id.help: ID that this device uses to connect to the remote device.
local-cache-id.name: local-cache-id

remote-cache-id.help: ID of the remote device to which the device connects.
remote-cache-id.name: remote-cache-id

remote-cache-ip.help: IP address of the remote device to which the device connects.
remote-cache-ip.name: remote-cache-ip

status.help: Enable/disable using remote device as Web cache storage.
status.name: status

options.help: Use local disks as Web cache storage.
options.name: disable

options.help: Use a remote device as Web cache storage.
options.name: enable

results.help: Configure a remote cache device as Web cache storage.
results.name: remote-storage
